text: The Bowls England National Championships (Women's Senior Singles) is one of the events at the annual Bowls England National Championships. ==Past Winners== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- !width="30"|Year !width="250"|Champion !width="250"|Runner-up |- | align=center|2008|| Jayne Roylance (Norfolk) ||Ann Anderson (Durham) |- | align=center|2009||Teresa Pearson (Durham) ||Andrea Dickinson (Suffolk) |- | align=center|2010||Wendy Davies (Sussex) ||Pauline Proud (Isle of Wight) |- | align=center|2011||Liz Garrity (Cumbria) ||Carol Gaskins (Oxfordshire) |- | align=center|2012||Sue Davies (Worcestershire) ||Sue Springell (Buckinghamshire) |- | align=center|2013||Moira Self (Suffolk) ||Pauline Proud (Isle of Wight) |- | align=center|2014||Alex Jacobs (Wiltshire) ||Sue Latham (Gloucestershire) |- | align=center|2015||Alex Jacobs (Wiltshire) ||Eleanor Benvie (Lancashire) |- | align=center|2016||Ann Anderson (Durham)||Bet Aubrey (Berkshire) |- | align=center|2017||Jenny Dempsey (Northamptonshire)||Brenda Bowyer (Essex) |- | align=center|2018||Sue Allen (Yorkshire) ||Andrea Dickinson (Norfolk) |- | align=center|2019||Rachel Mackriell (Sussex) ||Janet Eames (Notttinghamshire) |- |align=center|2020|| cancelled || due to the COVID-19 pandemic. |} ==References== Category:Bowls in England
title: Bowls England National Championships (Women's Senior Singles)
